Package core

Provides the classes necessary to solve Hidato Puzzle, Binpacking, and Product planning.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinPackProduct
    Binpacking Problem - Product Scheduling(Resource Allocation) sources [R1{10,10,10,10}, R2{5,5,5,5}, R3{2,2,2,2}] - total=68 Resources --- products [P1{10x1 + 2x1}, P2{1x5 + 2x2}, P3{1x2}] trucks = 10xTrucks = 10, 5xTrucks = 15
    HidatoSolver
    This class is created for solving a Hidato puzzle with using JaCoP library.

Package core Description

Provides the classes necessary to solve Hidato Puzzle, Binpacking, and Product planning.

This package includes Binpacking class and HidatoSolver class. These classes are modelling the problems and search for solutions. Hidato puzzle problem is taken from wikipedia. Truck loading and product planning problems created by ourselves.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hüsnü ISLEYEN
